website_summaries.verdict: This style is all about elevating Uggs to a higher ground with bling. Statement-making style with a surprisingly budget-friendly price compared to other Uggs. Sizing feels a bit different in these than other Ugg styles.
pros: Choose from gold, silver, navy, pink, or black
Suede heel counter adds integrity to the boot
Signature satin binding makes it easy to identify these unique boots as part of the Uggs family
cons: Sequin covering doesn’t offer the same quality water-resistance as regular Uggs
Sizing feels a bit different in these than other Ugg styles

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: These are knock offs! I compared these to the uggs I got from journeys and they are not even real! The label isn’t even spelled out say say uggs, and all the sequin came off after a few times of wearing them. I’m highly disappointed, highly don’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dollface

customer_reviews.title: Faux UGGS do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These are fake! Do not buy! I have 3 pairs, worn out 2 black pairs of authentic Sparkle Uggs and have a silver pair. These are short in an off way and the sizing was way off, my regular size was several sizes too small. No original box either. Could tell as soon as I opened the box that these were not authentic UGGs. Save your self the time and money and don’t Byam. I was so excited because these are sold out everywhere and I really want to replace my black pair again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy them and expect them to be NAVY BLUE... they’re Barney Purple 😒🚮
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love these !!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so sparkly and pretty. I have gotten so many compliments on these so far and I like that they can be either silver or pink.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Inferior UGG quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots in three colors — two from UGG and one from Amazon — to decide which I wanted. All three had major design problems. The gold ones were missing sequins (could see the white mesh underneath in places), the black ones were sewn in places with the sequins on the wrong side so you couldn’t change them to black, and all three, including the silver, had at least one boot where the sequins stuck out at the bottom on one side and weren’t sewn well. Could be that I was getting returns at the end of the season, but these should never have been sold. Not up to the UGG quality standards. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Manor

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg
customer_reviews.text: The boots came defective, poor workmanship, whosoever is doing quality control got to be blind. There was do many imperfection on both boots. The Sequins were missing in multiple spots ( inner & outer) and in some spots looks forced on. At this price point, this is not acceptable. I've returned them and ordered directly from Uggs site. The price difference was 3-4 dollars.I believe these are not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Usually I wear 7.5 I ordered size 8. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality, not to shiny in black color, but for me too shiny in silver. Silver more for teens, but black perfect for me, I am 40 ;), fancy, beautiful and very comfortable boots. Love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Karina Sheinker

customer_reviews.title: UGGs as expected!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is unique it's like a pink lavender. It's not as bright as I thought they would be which is great
customer_reviews.author: TMCPHAUL

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Sequins!
customer_reviews.text: I literally wore a pair of these out several years ago and was happy to see them available again. Quite a surprise to discover they are mermaid sequins! My beautiful silver reverses to pink, my favorite color! I love them! And yes, they are genuine Uggs. They have the Ugg hologram label in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Peeler

customer_reviews.title: perfect! look and feel awesome! love them!!
customer_reviews.text: awesome looking and feeling..same great quality uggs..perfect look and amazing feel..I love these! recently I purchased a pair of the koolaburra by ugg and I am so disappointed that I didn't get the real uggs because they do not have the comfort that uggs have and they are stiff. the real uggs like these always feel amazing and I can't say enough about the quality and look and feel. if I had enough credit I would buy them in blue too but I don't 😥
customer_reviews.author: Confused buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for a friend. They are really shiny, to much for my taste, but she adores them. They fit well and are comfortable. They were a great gift in her opinion and that is what matters. She would most definitely buy them again. Quick shipping and came sealed with box in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kcarlough

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and the person whom they were for was very pleased with them. I was told that they are very warm and best of all that they sparkled and in different colors. They fit as expected. I thought they were a bit over priced, but if the receiving person likes them, then so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: UGG HAS DONE IT AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely 😍. They aren't 'knock offs" as some reviews reported, but the real deal. They aren't cheap looking, you can wear them to dinner or going food shopping, it's up to you. They are nice and comfortable as all UGG Boots. I'm a happy camper. Happy Holidays To All🌲
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for someone who is a big UGG collector. I must say that these are unique and awesome. I've never seen a single pair like them. The fitment was perfect and it was boxed up perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Xerc

customer_reviews.title: Buy these boots they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a winner! I ordered a pair in black I love these boots and the beautiful sequins! Yes! Omg Ugg did not disappoint they are also authentic uggs. I typically wear a size 9 ordered a size 9 fits perfect and has room for me to grow if need be. These are great boots! Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: The fit is strange for me. Maybe it's just the ugg brand. They felt loose in the heals, but my toe was pretty much touching the end. I sized down from my normal shoe size. But the next size up (my normal size) would have been too big. I had too send them back, but they were absolutely gorgeous! A beautiful boot, wish they worked out.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Cool design
customer_reviews.text: I order a size 9 and received a size 8 i was pissed at first but they fit so everything turn fine at the end
customer_reviews.author: Eddsmooth

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!!! Great purchase and price
customer_reviews.text: I love my Uggs. These are as described and authentic Uggs. I have 3 other pair that came from ugg and Dillard’s and they are the same quality. I looked for these on Ugg site and they no longer sale them. I was happy to get them here on amazon and I was not disappointed. I wore them today and received so many compliments!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots!

customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love everything about this boot! It’s not to fat looking on your foot, the shine it gives off is gorgeous, it’s just a super fun boot and the price is perfect! Definitely ordering another pair

customer_reviews.title: FAKE BOOTS!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! FAKE BOOT. I waited way past the 30 day return and they are totally fake!! I have this same pair of boots ordered from Tilly's and this boot I received ain't it!! They aren't even comfortable and the top of the boots feels unsupported ,floppy and they run small. SUCKS NO REFUND NO RETURN 😡😡😡

product_meta.title: UGG Women's W Classic Short Sequin Fashion Boot
product_meta.description: Classic short sequin is an ugg iconic silhouette. It features 17mm uggpure uppers and insoles, a delightful sequin upper that changes color as you run your hand back and forth over the sequins, and the suede heel counter offers durability. The outsole is made from tread lite by ugg - a blown rubber with materials that offer extra cushion, durability and traction.
feature_bullets: Dyed Sheep Fur (Fur Origin: United States/United Kingdom/Spain/Ireland/Australia)
Shaft measures approximately ankle-high from arch
Sequin textile upper: 60% sequin, 40% polyester backing
